resources.string: Access to the camera is needed for detection
This application cannot run because it does not have the camera permission. The application will now exit.
Optical character recognition dependencies cannot be downloaded due to low device storage
You can compare this application version here and its version on Play Store to see if this application has been updated to the latest version.
This application will be usually updated automatically. If not, you can open Play Store, search for this application and update it manually.
the application will open the window
the application will open a window to display your device information and application information
the application will show you how to use it step by step
user will turn off the application completely
the camera will be opened in the next window to scan the text
auto focus mode will be turned on (green) or off (gray)
the camera will automatically focus when scanning text in the second window
the flash will be turned on when scanning text in the second window
Above is the button to open the window
so you can change the light and dark theme, see the user guide, view information about the device and application, or exit the application
This window is opened after you click the \'Open camera\' button in the previous window
text results will be displayed on the screen when you scan with the camera
You click on any location on the screen to select the result and switch to the \'Save to contacts\' window
You click this button to open contacts, create a new contact or edit and then save the contact
the application theme will be switched between light and dark modes
Turn on / off the dark theme
flash mode will be turned on (green) or off (gray)
No permission to use the camera
Would you like to follow application tour guide now?
The tour guide will in turn introduce the components of the application and their respective functions
To move on to the next introduction, click on the text
To exit the tour guide and start the application, click on the text
You can always follow the tour guide by clicking on the upper right menu and clicking on the line
